name: Super Slam Dunk
overview: Check out Olympic Star Magic Johnson in Virgin Games' SUPER SLAM DUNK for the Super NES. SUPER SLAM DUNK gives you all the lightning fast action of 5-on-5 ball with Magic himself giving pro tips for all 28 teams. You control the on-court action with precision passing and shooting, aggressive defense and slam dunks while up in the booth NBC professional Sportscaster and Official Lakers' announcer, Chick Hearn, calls the play-by-play. With 2 seconds left, there're are 40 feet and 5 sweaty guys between you and victory. Will you take the 3 pointer or drive for the slam dunk?
